verses.roman:
āste-vyaste pitā-mātā mukhe dila pāni
sustha hañā kahe prabhu apūrva kāhinī

synonyms: āste-vyaste—with great haste; pitā-mātā—both the parents; mukhe—on the mouth; dila—gave; pāni—water; sustha hañā—being revived; kahe—says; prabhu—the Lord; apūrva—something astonishing; kāhinī—narration.
translation: After His father and mother sprinkled water on His mouth with great haste, the Lord revived and said something wonderful they had never heard before.
